message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can come to a better agreement. I'm willing to pay up to $175 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about we meet in the middle at $185?
Hello Alice, I've thought about it and am willing to go up to $180 for the product. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
